alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 6:33PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Flagler, south central St. Johns and southeastern Putnam Counties through 715 PM EST... At 633 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crescent City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Bunnell, Crescent City, Andalusia and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
